data.meta_description:
5 likes, 0 comments - amanda_coffee_books on July 9, 2024: "Cover Reveal 
Title: The Halley Traveler Book 1 The Martian Trader Saga) 
Author: Mike 
Genre: Sci-fi / Post-apocalypse
Publisher: Beaver Castle Media

Buy Links:

https://www.amazon.co.uk/Halley-Traveler-Martian-Trader-Saga-ebook/dp/B0D34ZTJSS

https://www.amazon.com/Halley-Traveler-Martian-Trader-Saga-ebook/dp/B0D34ZTJSS

Blurb 
Chris Halley and his father run a trading ship across the Martian trade routes. When tragedy strikes, Chris is left all alone in an uncaring world. He must not only survive, but also discover and mete out the proper justice to his father’s murderer . . . if it doesn’t kill him first.

Author bio

Mike Mollman is a charming individual graced with good looks, undeniable charisma and humility. These descriptions come straight from his keyboard, so they must be treated as unimpeachable facts. Mike lives in the Richmond, Virginia area. When he’s not self-aggrandizing, he likes to spend time with his two dogs and the many voices in his head.
.
.
#coverreveal #sci".
